scope.title: Heading
scope.description: A primitive typographic component for constrained heading styles. Headings help to structure content on a page using relative visual prominence.

data.title: Heading
data.description: A primitive typographic component for constrained heading styles. Headings help to structure content on a page using relative visual prominence.
